name: HttpRequest
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest
description:
Http Request

HTTP request data associated with a log entry.

See also Google::Cloud::Logging::Entry#http_request.

methods.name: method
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#method
methods.description: The request method. Examples: "GET", "HEAD", "PUT", "POST". (String)

methods.name: method=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#method=
methods.description: The request method. Examples: "GET", "HEAD", "PUT", "POST". (String)

methods.name: url
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#url
methods.description: The URL. The scheme (http, https), the host name, the path and the query portion of the URL that was requested. Example: "http://example.com/some/info?color=red". (String)

methods.name: url=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#url=
methods.description: The URL. The scheme (http, https), the host name, the path and the query portion of the URL that was requested. Example: "http://example.com/some/info?color=red". (String)

methods.name: size
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#size
methods.description: The size of the HTTP request message in bytes, including the request headers and the request body. (Integer)

methods.name: size=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#size=
methods.description: The size of the HTTP request message in bytes, including the request headers and the request body. (Integer)

methods.name: status
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#status
methods.description: The response code indicating the status of response. Examples: 200, 404. (Integer)

methods.name: status=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#status=
methods.description: The response code indicating the status of response. Examples: 200, 404. (Integer)

methods.name: response_size
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#response_size
methods.description: The size of the HTTP response message sent back to the client, in bytes, including the response headers and the response body. (Integer)

methods.name: response_size=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#response_size=
methods.description: The size of the HTTP response message sent back to the client, in bytes, including the response headers and the response body. (Integer)

methods.name: user_agent
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#user_agent
methods.description: The user agent sent by the client. Example: "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows 98; Q312461; .NET CLR 1.0.3705)". (String)

methods.name: user_agent=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#user_agent=
methods.description: The user agent sent by the client. Example: "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows 98; Q312461; .NET CLR 1.0.3705)". (String)

methods.name: remote_ip
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#remote_ip
methods.description: The IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) of the client that issued the HTTP request. Examples: "192.168.1.1", "FE80::0202:B3FF:FE1E:8329". (String)

methods.name: remote_ip=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#remote_ip=
methods.description: The IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) of the client that issued the HTTP request. Examples: "192.168.1.1", "FE80::0202:B3FF:FE1E:8329". (String)

methods.name: referer
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#referer
methods.description: The referer URL of the request, as defined in HTTP/1.1 Header Field Definitions. (String)

methods.name: referer=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#referer=
methods.description: The referer URL of the request, as defined in HTTP/1.1 Header Field Definitions. (String)

methods.name: cache_hit
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#cache_hit
methods.description: Whether an entity was served from cache (with or without validation). (Boolean)

methods.name: cache_hit=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#cache_hit=
methods.description: Whether an entity was served from cache (with or without validation). (Boolean)

methods.name: validated
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#validated
methods.description: Whether the response was validated with the origin server before being served from cache. This field is only meaningful if cache_hit is true. (Boolean)

methods.name: validated=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
Entry
HttpRequest#validated=
methods.description: Whether the response was validated with the origin server before being served from cache. This field is only meaningful if cache_hit is true. (Boolean)
